why_interested.answer: I am passionate about pushing the boundaries of virtual production and immersive technology. This role aligns perfectly with my expertise in LED wall operations, Unreal Engine, and real-time rendering. Having led technical teams for high-profile clients like Mercedes-Benz, Sony Music, and NASA, I am excited to bring my experience in creative technology to drive innovation and deliver exceptional results.

question_patterns: How does your experience relate to this position
relevant_experience.answer: I have over 5 years of experience in creative technology and virtual production. As Director of Creative Technology at Madwell, I led a 25-person XR unit delivering award-winning projects. As Co-Founder of WLab, I built LED wall infrastructure and pioneered motion capture in microgravity for NASA. My technical expertise includes Unreal Engine, TouchDesigner, LiDAR, and real-time pipeline design.

question_patterns: Tell us about a time you led a team
leadership_experience.answer: I have extensive leadership experience, having managed teams of 25+ people across technical, creative, and production disciplines. At Madwell, I led an XR unit delivering projects with 1.5B+ impressions. At WLab, I built and managed cross-functional teams for virtual production. My management style emphasizes collaboration, clear communication, and empowering team members to excel in their expertise while maintaining focus on project goals.

question_patterns: What technical skills do you have
What software are you proficient in
technical_skills.answer: My technical skills include: Unreal Engine (expert), Virtual Production pipelines, LED wall technology and operation, TouchDesigner, LiDAR systems, Motion Capture (OptiTrack, Vicon), Python and C++ programming, Real-time rendering, Computational imaging, XR/VR/AR development, Interactive media design, and Technical direction for live productions.

visa_sponsorship.answer: Yes, I will require visa sponsorship now or in the future. I am currently on F-1 OPT and will need H-1B sponsorship.

salary_expectations.answer: Based on my experience and the responsibilities of this role, my salary expectation is in the range of $120,000 - $150,000 annually. I am open to discussion based on the total compensation package.

availability.answer: I can start with a 30-day notice period to ensure a smooth transition from my current commitments. I am flexible and can discuss an earlier start date if needed.

relocation.answer: I am currently based in Brooklyn, New York and prefer to stay in the NYC area. I am open to hybrid work arrangements and occasional travel as required.

greatest_strength.answer: My greatest strength is bridging the gap between creative vision and technical execution. I can communicate effectively with both creative directors and technical teams, ensuring that ambitious creative concepts are realized through robust technical solutions. This was instrumental in delivering projects like the Visible campaign (Webby winner) and NASA microgravity motion capture.

question_patterns: Tell us about a difficult project
challenge_overcome.answer: One significant challenge was pioneering motion capture in microgravity for NASA. This required adapting existing technology for a zero-gravity environment, coordinating with NASA engineers, and developing new workflows. Despite the technical complexities and tight timeline, we successfully delivered the project, opening new possibilities for space-based content creation.

question_patterns: Do you have virtual production experience
virtual_production_experience.answer: Yes, I have extensive virtual production experience. I have directed VP projects for Mercedes-Benz, Sony Music, e.l.f. Cosmetics (19.9M views), and NASA. I built and operated LED wall infrastructure at Mercer Labs and other locations. I am expert-level in Unreal Engine for real-time rendering and have developed proprietary workflows for LED stage operation and real-time compositing.

team_management.answer: I believe in servant leadership - empowering team members while providing clear direction. I regularly hold one-on-ones, foster open communication, and create psychological safety for innovation. When conflicts arise, I address them directly and constructively, focusing on solutions rather than blame. At Madwell, this approach helped my 25-person team deliver award-winning work while maintaining high morale.

career_goals.answer: My career goal is to be at the forefront of virtual production and immersive technology innovation. I aim to lead technical teams that push creative boundaries while delivering measurable business results. Long-term, I want to contribute to the evolution of VP as a standard production methodology and mentor the next generation of creative technologists.
